message.content:
I need to identify three specific values from the income statement:
1. Total income arising in the course of an entity's ordinary activities
2. Carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period
3. Costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole

Looking at the statement:
- The "Total Revenue" of 18062437.45 represents the total income from ordinary activities (value1)
- The "Cost of Goods Sold" of 13100000.00 represents the carrying amount of inventories sold (value2)
- The "Administrative Expenses" of 863669.20 represents the costs of general management and administration (value3)

```json
{"solution": {'value1': '18062437.45', 'value2': '13100000.00', 'value3': '863669.20'}}
```
